CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 公正的；公道的；正当的；正义的；正直的；合理的；恰当的；适宜的；合适的；有充分理由的
刚刚；刚才；仅；仅仅；只；只是；只不过；正是；正好；恰好；恰恰；精确地；确切地；公正地；公平地；确实；简直；立即；直接；完全；（表示稍有可能）也许；正当；正当…时

synonym.mean: 只是，仅仅；刚才，刚刚；正好，恰好；实在；刚要
公正的，合理的；正直的，正义的；正确的；公平的；应得的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有正当理由的；合乎情理的；事出有因的
调整（justify的过去分词）；证明…正当
可辩解的，有道理的；可证明为正当的
无可非议地；言之有理地
公正地；正当地；恰当地；正直地

word_difference_info.common_mean: 公正的；公平的；不偏不倚的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多用于庄重场合，指不受个人利益得失或感情倾向的影响，侧重按照公认的准则或标准处理问题。
侧重对任何人或任何一方没有成见或偏袒。
着重客观、真实，不为个人偏见、兴趣、感情或看法所左右。
强调持中立态度，不偏袒任何一方，甚至不作最后的裁决。
普通常用词，指不偏不倚地对待人和物，侧重不受个人感情、偏见或利益所影响。

word_group.brief_definition: 几乎, 近乎, 差不多
此时, 此刻, 眼下
很好；一切都好；只是罚款
(做或安排得)井井有条, 有条不紊
仅仅, 勉强；刚刚, 刚才
刚好及时；正好及时；刚好
(就是那样)突如其来, 冷不防, 不加解释
尽管如此；然而；仍然；依然；照样

bilingual.source: I just wanted you to be happy.

bilingual.target: 人们只是想要它们被杀死。

bilingual.source: Let's hope it's just a bank error!
bilingual.target: 希望这只是银行的错误！

bilingual.source: Some of them are just very hungry.
bilingual.target: 他们中的一些只是非常饿。

list.abstract: just，英文单词，作副词、形容词，翻译为仅仅、刚刚、公正的、合理的等。

yingyinNormal.en: Just Doss? Just Doss. Yeah, Doss, the Coward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只是多斯？只是多斯。对，多斯，那“懦夫”。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just saying. You're just saying?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是想说。你想说？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know, it's just…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道，只是…

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, those were just fireworks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只是些烟火啦。

yingyinNormal.en: It is just a drone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这只是一艘无人驾驶飞船。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just going to grab the phone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是要打电话。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, just out of curiosity...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是好奇...

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, maybe he just cheated on you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许他只是对你不忠。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just worried about our bills.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是担心我们的账单。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I just thought it was cute.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是，我只是觉得很可爱。

yingyinNormal.en: Dad, Dad, Dad, it was just a dream.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸，别激动，只是个梦。

yingyinNormal.en: I just thought you should know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是觉得应该让你们知道。

yingyinNormal.en: We just want you to think it through.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只是要你考虑清楚。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, good. I just needed to be sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真好。我只是想确定一下。

yingyinNormal.en: He probably just goes to the bathroom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他可能只是去拉大号吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah I know I know I know. I just...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我懂你意思，我只是...

yingyinNormal.en: I was just waiting for the perfect guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是在等完美的对象。

yingyinNormal.en: I just want to stand by my girl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是想在我闺蜜身旁守护她。

yingyinNormal.en: We're just trying to do a nice thing here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只是想让大家高兴。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Mom. No, that's just my secretary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈，不是，她只是我的秘书。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 未被证明为正当的；不正当的；未排整齐的
v. 说明或证明正确或合理；称义；使有义；排列整齐；有充分理由

word_family.mean: adj. 正义的；公正的；应得的；适当的；有充分根据的；恰如其分的；有理由的；无可非议的

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> 25 per cent of the country's land is suitable for crop-growing, most of which is already occupied by arable fields.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该国只有25%的土地适合种植农作物，其中大部分已经被耕地占据。

examination_example.sentence: Constant health scares <highlight>just</highlight> end up with one listening.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 持续不断的健康恐吓只会以无人听信而告终。

examination_example.sentence: Few of us <highlight>just</highlight> walk straight into the woods without a phone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们中很少有人不带电话就直接走进树林。

examination_example.sentence: You work with them every day, and you depend on them <highlight>just</highlight> as they depend on you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你每天和他们一起工作，你依赖他们就像他们依赖你一样。

examination_example.sentence: "They love Chip and Joanna Gaines <highlight>just</highlight> as much as the rest of us," he said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “他们和我们一样喜欢奇普和乔安娜·盖恩斯，”他说。

examination_example.sentence: I truly believe that once you get that first word out everything else will <highlight>just</highlight> flow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我真的相信，一旦你说出第一个字，其他的一切都会水到渠成。

sense_info_list.en: very recently; in the immediate past

examination_example.sentence: India has <highlight>just</highlight> announced it will eliminate all single-use plastic in the country by 2022.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 印度刚刚宣布，到2022年，该国将消除所有一次性塑料。

examination_example.sentence: Amazon has <highlight>just</highlight> announced the purchase of the upmarket grocery chain Whole Foods for $13.5bn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚马逊刚刚宣布以135亿美元收购高端食品连锁超市Whole Foods。

examination_example.sentence: Those <highlight>just</highlight> starting out in life are defining priorities and expectations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些人生刚刚起步的年轻人正在定义生活重心和人生期望。

sense_info_list.en: used as a polite formula for giving permission or making a request

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> think: what is the worst that could happen?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就想一想：可能发生的最糟糕的情况是什么？

examination_example.sentence: So when someone tries to communicate with you, <highlight>just</highlight> be in that communication wholeheartedly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以当有人试图和你交流时，请全心全意地投入进去。

examination_example.sentence: I know the feeling and here is my advice: <highlight>just</highlight> get it out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我知道这种感觉，我的建议是：请把它拿出来。

examination_example.sentence: It may be worth considering <highlight>just</highlight> how the point, purpose and value of a degree has changed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学位的意义、目的和价值发生了怎样的变化也许是值得思考的。

examination_example.sentence: I realised <highlight>just</highlight> how bad much of the medical literature frequently was.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我确实意识到医学文献经常是多么的糟糕。

examination_example.sentence: The author Adam Davidson relates a joke from cotton country about <highlight>just</highlight> how much a modern textile mill has been automated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者亚当·戴维森讲了一个产棉国的笑话，讲的是现代纺织厂自动化程度确实有多高。

sense_info_list.en: (of quantities) imprecise but fairly close to correct

examination_example.sentence: As Koziatek knows, there is learning in <highlight>just</highlight> about everything.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如Koziatek所知，几乎每件事都有学问。

examination_example.sentence: You wanted to say something — the first word — but it <highlight>just</highlight> won't come out, it feels like it is stuck somewhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你想说些什么——第一个词——但它就是说不出来，感觉像是卡在什么地方了。

examination_example.sentence: Sandberg would be no more newsworthy than any other highly capable person living in a more <highlight>just</highlight> society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一个更加公正的社会里，桑德伯格不会比其他任何有能力的人更有新闻价值。

sense_info_list.en: exactly or almost exactly at this or that moment

examination_example.sentence: There are some indications that it is preparing to do <highlight>just</highlight> that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有迹象表明，它正马上这样做。

sense_info_list.en: (of an opinion or appraisal) well founded

exam_freq_info.chinese: 就是(加强表示感情的语气)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 正当或合理的；情有可原的；无可非议的；能辩护的
v. 说明或证明正确或合理；称义；使有义；排列整齐；有充分理由

word_family.mean: adj. 正义的；公正的；应得的；适当的；有充分根据的；恰如其分的；有理由的；无可非议的

examination_example.sentence: These critics <highlight>just</highlight> oppose regulation itself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些反对者只是反对监管本身。

examination_example.sentence: The cumulative effect of these two factors is that many Americans are forced to take two or more part-time jobs, <highlight>just</highlight> to make ends meet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这两个因素的累积效应是，许多美国人被迫从事两份或两份以上的兼职工作，只是为了维持收支平衡。

examination_example.sentence: Can you run a 140, 000 kilogram train on <highlight>just</highlight> the steam generated by solar power?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能仅仅依靠太阳能产生的蒸汽来使一辆14万公斤的火车运行吗？

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>just</highlight> when many scientists have come to accept the existence of animal cultures, many of those cultures might vanish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但就在许多科学家开始接受动物文化存在的时候，许多动物文化可能会消失。

examination_example.sentence: The majority of them reported having daydreamed <highlight>just</highlight> before the accident.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们中的大多数人报告说，就在事故发生之前，他们做了白日梦。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> off the coast of Southern California sits Santa Cruz Island, where a magical creature called the island fox dwells.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 圣克鲁斯岛就位于加利福尼亚州南部海岸附近，岛上居住着一种叫做狐狸岛的神奇生物。

examination_example.sentence: So the computer will <highlight>just</highlight> get impatient talking to humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，计算机会变得不耐烦与人类对话。

examination_example.sentence: The depressing stories <highlight>just</highlight> keep coming.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 令人沮丧的故事不断出现。

examination_example.sentence: For the rest of us, however, our hearty lower-tiered universities are <highlight>just</highlight> fine, thank you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，对于我们其他人来说，我们热忱的低层次大学已经很好了，谢谢。

sense_info_list.zh: 就是(加强表示感情的语气)

examination_example.sentence: "I would think that it makes them better people, more critical, <highlight>just</highlight> wiser in general," he said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我认为这让他们成为更好的人，更审慎，更聪明，”他说。

examination_example.sentence: M: That's <highlight>just</highlight> the thing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就是这样。

examination_example.sentence: The trouble is, for many of the researchers who'd like to design systems to address these challenges, massive datasets for experimentation <highlight>just</highlight> don't exist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问题是，对于许多希望设计系统来应对这些挑战的研究人员来说，用于实验的海量数据集根本不存在。

examination_example.sentence: His results, published in May, suggest that many of his peers do <highlight>just</highlight> that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在5月份发表的结果中表明，他的许多同龄人就是这样做的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> as in the myth, technology—first fire and stone tools and later farming, the steam engine and industry, fossil fuels, chemicals and nuclear power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如神话中所说，技术首先是火和石器，然后是农业、蒸汽机和工业、化石燃料、化学品和核能。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> as when kids walk themselves through a process, adults can benefit from using language not <highlight>just</highlight> to communicate, but also to help "augment thinking".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像孩子们自己经历一个过程一样，成年人也可以从使用语言中受益，不仅是交流，而且还有助于“增强思维”。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> for fun, try it now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只是为了好玩，现在试试吧。

sense_info_list.en: very recently; in the immediate past

examination_example.sentence: And this is equally important if you're <highlight>just</highlight> starting out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你刚刚起步，这一点同样重要。

sense_info_list.en: based on or behaving according to what is morally right and fair

word_usage.usage:
just即是形容词又是副词，justly是由just（形容词，公正的）派生来的副词，用作“公正地，正当地”。不能把它和just（副词，刚刚）混淆。
示例：
He has just spoken.
他刚发了言。
He has spoken justly.
他讲得有理。

just作“恰好，正是”时，一般不用于否定句，表示此意的否定句要用not quite。
示例：这不完全是他想要的。
误 It is just not what he wanted.
正 It is not quite what he wanted.

just now：
表示“刚才”时，动词用一般过去时；
表示“现在，此刻”时，动词用一般现在时或现在进行时；
表示“立刻，马上”时，动词用现在进行时、一般将来时或将来进行时。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通常用词, 指不偏不倚地对待人和物, 侧重不受个人感情、偏见或利益所影响。
侧重对任何人或任何一方没有成见或偏袒。
多用于庄重场合, 指不受个人利益得失或感情倾向的影响, 侧重按照公认的准则或标准处理问题。
强调持中立态度, 不偏袒任何一方, 甚至不作最后的裁决。
着重客观、真实, 不为个人偏见、兴趣、感情或看法所左右。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 很好；一切都好；只是罚款

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 说明或证明正确或合理；称义；使有义；排列整齐；有充分理由

word_family.mean: adj. 正义的；公正的；应得的；适当的；有充分根据的；恰如其分的；有理由的；无可非议的

examination_example.sentence: You <highlight>just</highlight> have to do a little thinking ahead and redefine what qualifies as dinner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你只需要提前想一下，重新定义什么是晚餐。

examination_example.sentence: So you <highlight>just</highlight> need to sign the form to say you've received it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以你只需要在表格上签字就可以了。

examination_example.sentence: And you don't get grades, and you go <highlight>just</highlight> because you want to learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你得不到分数，你去那里只是因为你想学习。

sense_info_list.en: very recently; in the immediate past

examination_example.sentence: That is 5 times smaller than the pearl that the fisherman <highlight>just</highlight> handed in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那比渔夫刚交上来的珍珠小5倍。

examination_example.sentence: Six birds have <highlight>just</highlight> been trained to pick up rubbish at a French historical theme park.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国一家历史主题公园训练出了六只会自己捡垃圾的鸟。

examination_example.sentence: She has <highlight>just</highlight> transferred to the college.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她刚转到那所大学。

examination_example.sentence: Digital access codes are criticized because they are profit-driven <highlight>just</highlight> like the textbook business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字接入码受到批评，因为它们与教科书业务一样，是以利润为导向的。

sense_info_list.en: used as a polite formula for giving permission or making a request

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> make sure you're logged in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请确定你已经登录。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> let me know what type of food you would like to try.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请告诉我你想吃什么样的食物。

examination_example.sentence: So you'll be <highlight>just</highlight> fine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以你一定会没事的。

examination_example.sentence: And my boyfriend's English is so good that we <highlight>just</highlight> basically speak English all the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且我男朋友的英语很好，我们基本上就是一直说英语。

sense_info_list.en: (of quantities) imprecise but fairly close to correct

examination_example.sentence: That diet is the polar opposite of the healthy, mostly plant based diet that <highlight>just</highlight> about every expert says we should be eating.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种饮食与几乎所有专家都说我们应该吃的以植物为主的健康饮食截然相反。

sense_info_list.en: exactly or almost exactly at this or that moment
(of an opinion or appraisal) well founded

word_usage.usage:
just now：
表示“刚才”时，动词用一般过去时；
表示“现在，此刻”时，动词用一般现在时或现在进行时；
表示“立刻，马上”时，动词用现在进行时、一般将来时或将来进行时。

just即是形容词又是副词，justly是由just（形容词，公正的）派生来的副词，用作“公正地，正当地”。不能把它和just（副词，刚刚）混淆。
示例：
He has just spoken.
他刚发了言。
He has spoken justly.
他讲得有理。

just作“恰好，正是”时，一般不用于否定句，表示此意的否定句要用not quite。
示例：这不完全是他想要的。
误 It is just not what he wanted.
正 It is not quite what he wanted.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 公正的; 合理的; 应得的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 说明或证明正确或合理；称义；使有义；排列整齐；有充分理由

word_family.mean: adj. 正义的；公正的；应得的；适当的；有充分根据的；恰如其分的；有理由的；无可非议的

examination_example.sentence: There were some tough times and I <highlight>just</highlight> felt extremely tired.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一些艰难的时刻，我只是觉得非常累。

examination_example.sentence: Now he hopes that other cities will consider making their streets run smarter instead of <highlight>just</highlight> making them bigger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在他希望其他城市会考虑让他们的街道变得更智能，而不是仅让它们变大。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps <highlight>just</highlight> a drinking cup—to catch the water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许只是一个杯子——用来接水。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> like the traffic itself, the timing of the signals changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正好像交通本身一样，信号灯的时间也在变化。

examination_example.sentence: Suddenly a football fell <highlight>just</highlight> in front of me and almost hit me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突然一个足球正好落在我面前，差点砸到我。

examination_example.sentence: It was a relief and I came to a sudden stop <highlight>just</highlight> in the middle of the road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我松了一口气，突然在路中间突然停了下来。

examination_example.sentence: He had <highlight>just</highlight> lost his job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他刚失业。

examination_example.sentence: Um, sorry, we've <highlight>just</highlight> sold out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 抱歉，我们刚卖完。

examination_example.sentence: What's that book you <highlight>just</highlight> picked up, Mary?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玛丽，你刚捡到的那本书是什么？

examination_example.sentence: And, before I finish, let me <highlight>just</highlight> give you some advice which should make your stay more enjoyable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我结束之前，让我此刻给你一些建议，让你在这里过得更愉快。

examination_example.sentence: Volunteering <highlight>just</highlight> feels so good.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 做志愿者感觉真的很好。

examination_example.sentence: You <highlight>just</highlight> focus on the move.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你只需要专注于行动。

sense_info_list.zh: 公正的; 合理的; 应得的

exam_freq_info.chinese: 只是; 仅仅; 确实; 完全
精确地; 恰好; 恰恰在某个时刻

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 只是; 仅仅; 确实; 完全

examination_example.sentence: The Chinese created a 3D-printed building in <highlight>just</highlight> 48 hours in 2014.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2014年，中国人仅用48小时就创造了一座3D打印的建筑。

examination_example.sentence: Some people are already lucky, and they <highlight>just</highlight> don't know it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人已经很幸运了，只是他们不知道而已。

examination_example.sentence: When we want to share something good we <highlight>just</highlight> have it photocopied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们想要分享好的东西时，我们只需要把它影印出来。

sense_info_list.en: used as a polite formula for giving permission or making a request

examination_example.sentence: Whenever you have problems, <highlight>just</highlight> let me know.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论什么时候你有问题，请告诉我。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> stand aside, let people out, and then get in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请站在一边，让人们出去，然后进去。

examination_example.sentence: If you don't want to see him, <highlight>just</highlight> write him a note.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不想见他，就给他写张便条。

sense_info_list.en: exactly; exactly or almost exactly at this or that moment
sense_info_list.zh: 精确地; 恰好; 恰恰在某个时刻

examination_example.sentence: It looks and speaks <highlight>just</highlight> like a real person．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它看起来和说话都和真人一样。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> two years after we started my father decided that we needed a full-time waiter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在我们开业仅仅两年之后，我父亲决定我们需要一个全职服务员。

examination_example.sentence: Everybody can drive it, <highlight>just</highlight> like riding bike.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都可以驾驶它，就像骑自行车一样。

examination_example.sentence: He always said, "A man is <highlight>just</highlight> like a seed. Please be a good seed."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他总是说："一个人就像一粒种子。请做一粒好种子。"

examination_example.sentence: I think my failure that term taught me <highlight>just</highlight> as much as my success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想我那学期的失败和成功一样教会了我很多。

examination_example.sentence: Dear boy, my heart is <highlight>just</highlight> as beautiful as your heart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亲爱的孩子，我的心和你的心一样美丽。

sense_info_list.en: very recently; in the immediate past

examination_example.sentence: What did Jenny do <highlight>just</highlight> now?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 珍妮刚才做了什么?

examination_example.sentence: A war had <highlight>just</highlight> ended there and left many children living on the streets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那里刚刚结束了一场战争，许多孩子流落街头。

examination_example.sentence: Because you <highlight>just</highlight> dragged me 40 years into the past.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为你刚才把我拽回了40年前。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> then her mother came in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在这时，她的母亲进来了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> then a crow came and sat on Jina's head.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在这时，一只乌鸦来了，坐在吉娜的头上。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> then, Ben Rogers comes along the road with an apple in his hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在那时，本·罗杰斯手里拿着一个苹果沿着路走来。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Just</highlight> a minute.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请稍后。

word_usage.usage:
just即是形容词又是副词，justly是由just（形容词，公正的）派生来的副词，用作“公正地，正当地”。不能把它和just（副词，刚刚）混淆。
示例：
He has just spoken.
他刚发了言。
He has spoken justly.
他讲得有理。

just作“恰好，正是”时，一般不用于否定句，表示此意的否定句要用not quite。
示例：这不完全是他想要的。
误 It is just not what he wanted.
正 It is not quite what he wanted.

just now：
表示“刚才”时，动词用一般过去时；
表示“现在，此刻”时，动词用一般现在时或现在进行时；
表示“立刻，马上”时，动词用现在进行时、一般将来时或将来进行时。
